extensionDescription.message: One-click copy of the complete Google AI Studio conversation into structured Markdown format.

tooltipCopyMarkdown.description: The tooltip text for the copy button.

promptTitleDefault.description: The default title for a conversation if it's not named.

errorNoDataSource.message: Failed to get conversation data source!
errorNoDataSource.description: Error message when the script cannot find the conversation data.

successCopied.description: Success message after the conversation is copied to the clipboard.

tooltipCatalog.description: The tooltip text for the catalog toggle button.

catalogHeader.description: The header text for the catalog panel.

catalogEmptyState.description: Message displayed when the catalog is empty or no user prompts are available.
